document_data.mainbody: '''Callarduran Smoothhands''' ({{Pronounce|KAL|ur|duhr|an|refs=}}), also known as '''the Deep Brother''', was a [[neutral]] [[gnome]] [[deity]]. He was primarily venerated as the patron of the [[Underdark]]-dwelling [[gnome]] subrace, the [[svirfneblin]].
document_data.Worshipers:
[[File:Smoothhands symbol.jpg|thumb|''The holy symbol of Callarduran Smoothhands.'']]
The church of Callarduran was highly organized, so that clans could share information and coordinate against the dangers of the Underdark, such as the [[drow]].
document_data.Relationships: Callarduran was a distant ally of the other non-evil deities of the [[Lords of the Golden Hills|gnome pantheon]]. He was also loosely linked to the other patrons of non-evil Underdark deities, such as [[Eilistraee]], [[Shevarash]], [[Dumathoin]], and [[Geb]]. His foes were the [[Dark Seldarine]] and the other evil Underdark deities.
